name: store-selector
description: Store selector shows the nearby stores where an item is available for pickup

lookupRadius.description: Radius, in miles or kilometers, to use when searching for nearby store locations

termsOfServiceLink.description: Link to the terms of service

linkText.description: Text for call to action link

openInNewTab.description: Open the link in a new tab

mode.description: Define whether it's Find store mode or Pick up in store mode

searchRadiusUnit.description: Define to choose search radius unit in miles or kilometers when displaying distance for a store is from the current location

style.description: Define if module should be rendered inline or as a dialog

setAsPreferredStore.description: Switch to turn set as preferred store on or off

showAllStores.description: Switch to turn show all stores on or off

autoSuggestOptions.description: Provide additional data to customized auto suggest

className.description: Provide a custom css class name defined in the theme pack to target the CSS for this module

searchPlaceholderText.comment: Placeholder Text for Search By Location
searchPlaceholderText.value: Enter ZIP code or city, state

searchButtonAriaLabel.comment: Aria Label for the search button

searchInputAriaLabel.comment: Aria Label for the search input

outOfStockText.comment: Text for when item is out of stock

inStockText.comment: Text for when item is in  stock

selectedStoreLocationText.comment: Text to show in place of button if location is selected for the product

emptyLocationsText.comment: Text for when there are no nearby locations
emptyLocationsText.value: No nearby locations found. Narrow your search criteria or search for a different location.

selectStoreText.comment: Button text for selecting store for pickup

selectStoreAriaFormatText.comment: Aria label text for selecting store for pickup. {StoreName} = name of store

setAsPreferredStoreText.comment: Button text for set as preferred store

setAsPreferredStoreTextAriaLabel.comment: Aria label for set as preferred store

timeText.comment: This field is used to specify the store hours text

captionText.value: Weâ€™re expanding our pick-up-in-store service to more locations every day.

milesShortText.comment: Used when displaying distance a store is from the current location in miles

kilometersShortText.comment: Used when displaying distance a store is from the current location in kilometers

contactText.comment: This field is to specify contact text

availabilityText.comment: This field is to specify availability text

productDimensionTypeColor.comment: String that corresponds to the Color Product Dimension Type (1)

productDimensionTypeConfiguration.comment: String that corresponds to the Configuration Product Dimension Type (2)

productDimensionTypeSize.comment: String that corresponds to the Size Product Dimension Type (3)

productDimensionTypeStyle.comment: String that corresponds to the Style Product Dimension Type (4)

storeHoursClosedText.comment: String to show on store hours for days where store is closed

storeHoursMondayText.comment: String to show when refering to the day 'Monday'

storeHoursTuesdayText.comment: String to show when refering to the day 'Tuesday'

storeHoursWednesdayText.comment: String to show when refering to the day 'Wednesday'

storeHoursThursdayText.comment: String to show when refering to the day 'Thursday'

storeHoursFridayText.comment: String to show when refering to the day 'Friday'

storeHoursSaturdayText.comment: String to show when refering to the day 'Saturday'

storeHoursSundayText.comment: String to show when refering to the day 'Sunday'

storeHoursMondayFullText.comment: String to show when referring to the day 'Monday'

storeHoursTuesdayFullText.comment: String to show when referring to the day 'Tuesday'

storeHoursWednesdayFullText.comment: String to show when referring to the day 'Wednesday'

storeHoursThursdayFullText.comment: String to show when referring to the day 'Thursday'

storeHoursFridayFullText.comment: String to show when referring to the day 'Friday'

storeHoursSaturdayFullText.comment: String to show when referring to the day 'Saturday'

storeHoursSundayFullText.comment: String to show when referring to the day 'Sunday'

storeCountMessage.comment: message to show in BPOIS modal count of stores
storeCountMessage.value: We found {count} stores within {radius} miles of you.

storeAllCountMessage.comment: message to show in BPOIS modal count of all stores

storeCountMessageInKm.comment: message to show in BPOIS modal count of stores
storeCountMessageInKm.value: We found {count} stores within {radius} kilometers of you.

storeSelectorHeaderText.value: Buy now, pick up in a store
storeSelectorHeaderText.comment: Heading text for the find in store section

storeLocatorHeaderText.comment: Header text for store locator section

seeAllStoresText.comment: Text for see all stores link
